content.rendered:
Auto Club

We partner with PTS Auto Club to provide additional roadside services that go beyond your regular car insurance to keep you on the road with confidence.

Plans are $8 a month for individuals and $10 a month for families.
Our plans are flexible, with 3, 6, 9 and 12 month terms available!1

Benefits Include:

  • Towing Reimbursement ($85)2
  • Lockout Reimbursement ($85)2
  • Flat Tire Repair ($15)2
  • Battery Charge ($15)2
  • Traffic Court Defense Fee Reimbursement ($175)2
  • Stolen Automobile Reward ($2,500)
  • AT&T Discount
  • Rental Car Discounts
  • Travel Discounts
  • & more!

Ready to join Auto Club?

Contact Us

1 Auto club available in Nevada and Missouri. Services and products are subject to change at any time for any reason.
2 Reimbursement amount per occurrence. Other exclusions may apply.
